Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.bubbles.game.GameObject
com.ultreon.bubbles.entity.Entity
com.ultreon.bubbles.entity.LivingEntity
com.ultreon.bubbles.entity.player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
StateHolder, InputController
public class Player extends LivingEntity implements InputController

    • Player

      public Player(Environment environment)
      Player entity. The player is controlled be the keyboard and is one create the important features create the game. (Almost any game).

    • applyForce

      public void applyForce(Point2D velocity, double delta)

      velocity - the amount velocity for bounce.
      delta - the delta change.
